options.content: Azure Edge Services - ${component_text} Health
Scenario Health (SLO/RUM) related to ${component_text}

panels.description: This represents the health of the Data Processor's Service Level Objective (SLO): Green shows a healthy state, red indicates an unhealthy state, and transparency represents the absence of data. Pipeline Heartbeats. This metric signifies the successful passage of heartbeats through each pipeline, ensuring the continuous flow of data, guaranteeing the basic functionality of pipelines. Pipeline Internal Latency. This metric measures the total latency within pipelines, excluding any latency introduced by external calls. The latency threshold of 1000ms is set in Grafana variables. Pipeline Success Rate. This performance indicator is calculated as the ratio between the total number of errors and the total number of messages processed across all pipelines. The error rate threshold of 5% is set in Grafana variables.

targets.expr:
label_replace(min(
    label_replace(
        (
            sgn(
                (
                    sum(increase(aio_dp_reader_errors{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0)) + 
                    sum(increase(aio_dp_stage_errors{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0))
                ) / 
                (
                    sum(increase(aio_dp_reader_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0)) + 
                    sum(increase(aio_dp_stage_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0))
                )
                > $aio_dp_error_rate
            ) - 1
            or
            sgn(
                sum(increase(aio_dp_reader_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0)) + 
                sum(increase(aio_dp_stage_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0))
                > 0
            )
            or vector(404)
        )
        ,"_","Pipeline Success Rate","","")
    or
    label_replace(
        (min(
            sgn(
                max(
                    histogram_quantile(0.95, rate(aio_dp_pipeline_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
                    ) < $aio_dp_latency_threshold_ms
                )
            or
            1 - sgn(
                    max(
                        histogram_quantile(0.95, rate(aio_dp_pipeline_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
                    ) >= $aio_dp_latency_threshold_ms
                )
        ) 
        or vector(404))
        ,"_","Pipeline Internal Latency","","")
    or        
    label_replace(
        (
            min(
                sgn(
                    sum(rate(aio_dp_reader_processed_heartbeats{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
                    >= sum(rate(aio_dp_reader_incoming_heartbeats{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
                )
                or
                sgn(
                    sum(rate(aio_dp_stage_heartbeats{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
                    >= sum(rate(aio_dp_reader_processed_heartbeats{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
                )
            )
            or vector(404))
    ,"_","Pipeline Heartbeats","","")
    # or
    # label_replace(
    #     (
    #         sgn(
    #             sum by(server_id)(nats_varz_jetstream_stats_storage{cluster="$cluster"}) > 0
    #             and
    #             (sum by(server_id)(nats_varz_jetstream_stats_storage{cluster="$cluster"}) / 
    #             sum by(server_id)(nats_varz_jetstream_config_max_storage{cluster="$cluster"}))
    #             <= $aio_dp_nats_utilization_threshold
    #         )
    #     or vector(404))
    # ,"_","Message Store","","")
),"_","Data Processor Health","","")

label_replace(
    (
        sgn(
            (
                sum(increase(aio_dp_reader_errors{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0)) + 
                sum(increase(aio_dp_stage_errors{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0))
            ) / 
            (
                sum(increase(aio_dp_reader_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0)) + 
                sum(increase(aio_dp_stage_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0))
            )
            > $aio_dp_error_rate
        ) - 1
        or
        sgn(
            sum(increase(aio_dp_reader_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0)) + 
            sum(increase(aio_dp_stage_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0))
            > 0
        )
        or vector(404)
    )
    ,"_","Pipeline Success Rate","","")
or
label_replace(
    (min(
        sgn(
            max(
                histogram_quantile(0.95, rate(aio_dp_pipeline_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
                ) < $aio_dp_latency_threshold_ms
            )
        or
        1 - sgn(
                max(
                    histogram_quantile(0.95, rate(aio_dp_pipeline_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
                ) >= $aio_dp_latency_threshold_ms
            )
    ) 
    or vector(404))
    ,"_","Pipeline Internal Latency","","")
or        
label_replace(
    (
        min(
            sgn(
                sum(rate(aio_dp_reader_processed_heartbeats{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
                >= sum(rate(aio_dp_reader_incoming_heartbeats{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
            )
            or
            sgn(
                sum(rate(aio_dp_stage_heartbeats{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
                >= sum(rate(aio_dp_reader_processed_heartbeats{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
            )
        )
        or vector(404))
,"_","Pipeline Heartbeats","","")

panels.title: Service Level Objectives

targets.expr: avg_over_time((histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(aio_dp_pipeline_internal_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, pipeline_id)) >= 0)[$__range:])
sum(rate(aio_dp_stage_errors{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
sum(rate(aio_dp_reader_errors{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))

options.content: Pipelines

targets.expr: histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(aio_dp_pipeline_internal_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, pipeline_id, cloud_resource_id))
sum(increase(aio_dp_stage_outgoing_messages{cluster="$cluster",stage_type=~"messagestore/.*"}[$__range])) by (pipeline_id, cloud_resource_id)
sum(increase(aio_dp_stage_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster",stage_type=~"output/.*"}[$__range])) by (pipeline_id)
sum(increase(aio_dp_stage_errors{cluster="$cluster"}[$__range])) by (pipeline_id)
avg_over_time((histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(aio_dp_pipeline_internal_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, pipeline_id)) >= 0)[$__range:])
avg_over_time((histogram_quantile(0.99, sum(rate(aio_dp_pipeline_internal_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, pipeline_id)) >= 0)[$__range:])
sum(increase(aio_dp_stage_heartbeats{cluster="$cluster"}[$__range])) by (pipeline_id)
avg by(pipeline_id) (aio_dp_runner_checkpoint_size{cluster="$cluster"})
sum(increase(aio_dp_reader_errors{cluster="$cluster"}[$__range])) by (pipeline_id)

sum by (le, pipeline_id, cloud_resource_id) (increase(aio_dp_reader_errors{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0)) + sum by (le, pipeline_id, cloud_resource_id) (increase(aio_dp_stage_errors{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0))

sum by (le, pipeline_id, cloud_resource_id) (increase(aio_dp_reader_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0)) + sum by (le, pipeline_id, cloud_resource_id) (increase(aio_dp_stage_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]) or vector(0))

options.content: Stages & Others

targets.expr: count(count by (cloud_resource_id, stage_id) (rate(aio_dp_stage_info{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])))

panels.description: Total count of enriched messages across the cluster.

targets.expr: sum(aio_dp_enrich_latency_count{cluster="$cluster"})

panels.title: Enriched Message Count

panels.description: Enrichment latency broken down by pipeline.

targets.expr: sum(rate(aio_dp_enrich_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (pipeline_id)

panels.title: Reference Data Enrichment Latency

panels.description: Heartbeat solely provide a count of how many times a heartbeat traverses each stage in the pipeline, with the count being higher for pipelines with more runners and stages, and they do not convey any additional health-related information about the system.

targets.expr: sum(increase(aio_dp_stage_heartbeats{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le, pipeline_id)

panels.title: Heartbeat Count

targets.expr: count(count by (cloud_resource_id, runner_partition) (rate(aio_dp_runner_info{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])))
count(count by(enrich_datasetid, cluster) (aio_dp_refdata_global_store_get_latency_count{cluster="$cluster"}))
sum(rate(aio_dp_runner_checkpoint_error{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))

options.content: Self-test Pipeline

value.title: Show details from the MQ Service Health dashboard
Show details from the DP message store dashboard

targets.expr:
label_replace(min(
    label_replace(
        (min(sgn(rate(
            aio_dp_reader_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster", cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[$__rate_interval]
            )*60)) or vector(-1))
        ,"_","Self-test Input","","") or
    label_replace(
        (min(
            0 * sgn(0 < round(sum(increase(aio_dp_stage_errors{cluster="$cluster",cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[$__rate_interval])))) or
            1 * sgn(aio_dp_stage_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster", stage_type=~"output/.*", cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}) or
            vector(0)>0
        ) or vector(404))
        ,"_","Self-test Stage Errors","","") or
    label_replace(
        (min(sgn(rate(
            aio_dp_stage_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster", stage_type=~"output/.*", cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[$__rate_interval]
            )*60)) or vector(-1))
        ,"_","Self-test Output","","") or
    label_replace(
        (min(
            1 * sgn(max(histogram_quantile(0.95, rate(
                aio_dp_pipeline_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster",cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[5m]
                ))) < $aio_dp_latency_threshold_ms) or
            0 * sgn(max(histogram_quantile(0.95, rate(
                aio_dp_pipeline_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster",cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[5m]
                ))) >= $aio_dp_latency_threshold_ms) or
            vector(0)>0
        ) or vector(404))
        ,"_","Self-test Pipeline Latency","","") or 
    # label_replace(label_replace(
    #     (min(
    #         0 * sgn(max(
    #             100 * sum by(server_id)(nats_varz_jetstream_stats_storage{cluster="$cluster"})
    #             / sum by(server_id)(nats_varz_jetstream_config_max_storage{cluster="$cluster"})
    #             ) > 90) or
    #         1 * sgn(max(
    #             100 * sum by(server_id)(nats_varz_jetstream_stats_storage{cluster="$cluster"})
    #             / sum by(server_id)(nats_varz_jetstream_config_max_storage{cluster="$cluster"})
    #             ) <= 90) or
    #         vector(0)>0
    #     ) or vector(404))
    #     ,"url","/d/e17d0b7f-9771-4cb8-adf9-56cbaef3fff6/aio-service-dp-messagestore","","")
    #     ,"_","Store Utilization","","") or 
    vector(0)>0
),"_","Self-test Pipeline Health","","")

#label_replace(min(
    label_replace(
        (min(sgn(rate(
            aio_dp_reader_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster", cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[$__rate_interval]
            )*60)) or vector(-1))
        ,"_","Self-test Input","","") or
    label_replace(
        (min(
            0 * sgn(0 < round(sum(increase(aio_dp_stage_errors{cluster="$cluster",cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[$__rate_interval])))) or
            1 * sgn(aio_dp_stage_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster", stage_type=~"output/.*", cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}) or
            vector(0)>0
        ) or vector(404))
        ,"_","Self-test Stage Errors","","") or
    label_replace(
        (min(sgn(rate(
            aio_dp_stage_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster", stage_type=~"output/.*", cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[$__rate_interval]
            )*60)) or vector(-1))
        ,"_","Self-test Output","","") or
    label_replace(
        (min(
            1 * sgn(max(histogram_quantile(0.95, rate(
                aio_dp_pipeline_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster",cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[5m]
                ))) < $aio_dp_latency_threshold_ms) or
            0 * sgn(max(histogram_quantile(0.95, rate(
                aio_dp_pipeline_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster",cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[5m]
                ))) >= $aio_dp_latency_threshold_ms) or
            vector(0)>0
        ) or vector(404))
        ,"_","Self-test Pipeline Latency","","") or 
    # label_replace(label_replace(
    #     (min(
    #         0 * sgn(max(
    #             100 * sum by(server_id)(nats_varz_jetstream_stats_storage{cluster=~"$cluster"})
    #             / sum by(server_id)(nats_varz_jetstream_config_max_storage{cluster=~"$cluster"})
    #             ) > 90) or
    #         1 * sgn(max(
    #             100 * sum by(server_id)(nats_varz_jetstream_stats_storage{cluster=~"$cluster"})
    #             / sum by(server_id)(nats_varz_jetstream_config_max_storage{cluster=~"$cluster"})
    #             ) <= 90) or
    #         vector(0)>0
    #     ) or vector(404))
    #     ,"url","/d/e17d0b7f-9771-4cb8-adf9-56cbaef3fff6/aio-service-dp-messagestore","","")
    #     ,"_","Store Utilization","","") or 
    vector(0)>0
#),"_","Self-test Pipeline Health","","")

label_replace(
    max(histogram_quantile(0.95, rate(
    aio_dp_pipeline_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster",cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[5m]
    )))
    ,"_","Self-test Pipeline Latency","","") or
label_replace($aio_dp_latency_threshold_ms * sgn(
    max(histogram_quantile(0.95, rate(
    aio_dp_pipeline_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster",cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[5m]
    )))
    ),"_","Self-test Latency Threshold","","") or
label_replace(label_replace(
    max(histogram_quantile(0.95, rate(
    aio_dp_pipeline_latency_bucket{cluster=~"$cluster",cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[5m]
    ))) >= $aio_dp_latency_threshold_ms
    ,"x","Over threshold","","")
    ,"_","Self-test pipeline latency over threshold","","") or
label_replace(vector(0),"_","hidden-timeline","","") or
vector(0)>0

label_replace(
            max(round(rate(
            aio_dp_stage_incoming_messages{cluster=~"$cluster", stage_type=~"output/.*", cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[$__rate_interval]
            )*60))
        ,"_","Self-test Output (msgs/min)","","") or
    label_replace(
            0 < round(sum(increase(aio_dp_stage_errors{cluster=~"$cluster",cloud_resource_id=~"$aio_dp_self_test_pipeline"}[$__rate_interval])))
        ,"_","Self-test Error Rate","","")

panels.title: Self-test Number of Output and Errors

options.content: Golden Metrics

targets.expr:
label_replace(#quantile_over_time($latency_percentile,
    sum(rate(aio_dp_reader_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval]))
    #[$latency_quantile_range:])
    ,"_","Input (msgs/sec)","","") or
label_replace(#quantile_over_time($latency_percentile,
    sum(rate(aio_dp_stage_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster",stage_type=~"output/.*"}[$__rate_interval]))
    #[$latency_quantile_range:])
    ,"_","Output (msgs/sec)","","") or
label_replace(
    count(count by (cloud_resource_id, runner_partition) (rate(aio_dp_runner_info{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])))
    ,"_","Runners (count)","","") or
# label_replace(vector(1),"_","TODO: Usage/Volume","","") or
vector(0) > 0
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(aio_dp_pipeline_latency_bucket{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) by (le))

label_replace(
    (  (sum(rate(aio_dp_reader_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0 or vector(0))
      / (sum(rate(aio_dp_reader_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0 or vector(1))
    ) and
        (sum(rate(aio_dp_stage_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster",stage_type=~"output/.*"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0)
    or  
    (  (sum(rate(aio_dp_reader_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0 or vector(0))
      / (sum(rate(aio_dp_reader_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) > 0 or vector(1))
    ) >0 and
        (sum(rate(aio_dp_stage_incoming_messages{cluster="$cluster",stage_type=~"output/.*"}[$__rate_interval])) == 0) * 0
    ,"_",".Success Rate","","") * 100 or
label_replace(
    sum(rate(aio_dp_stage_errors{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0)
    ,"_","Stage Errors","","") or
label_replace(
sum(rate(aio_dp_reader_errors{cluster="$cluster"}[$__rate_interval])) or vector(0)
    ,"_","Reader Errors","","") or
#label_replace(vector(1),"_","TODO: Success Rate","","") or
vector(0) > 0
100 * sum by(server_id)(aio_dp_msg_store_varz_jetstream_stats_storage{cluster=~"$cluster"}) / sum by(server_id)(aio_dp_msg_store_varz_jetstream_config_max_storage{cluster=~"$cluster"})

options.content: Infrastructure Workload Health

links.title: See infra workload health for all components

targets.expr:
## Workload Readiness health
############################
label_replace(min(
avg(label_join( # Workload ready percents (for deployment, daemonset, and statefulset)
    label_replace(label_join(
        kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",deployment=~"${component:raw}"} or
        kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",daemonset=~"${component:raw}"} or
        kube_statefulset_status_replicas_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",statefulset=~"${component:raw}"}
        ,"workloadName", "", "deployment", "daemonset", "statefulset")
        ,"workloadType", "$1", "__name__", "kube_(.*)_status_.*")
  / label_replace(label_join(
        kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",daemonset=~"${component:raw}"} or
        kube_deployment_spec_replicas{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",deployment=~"${component:raw}"} or
        kube_statefulset_status_replicas{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",statefulset=~"${component:raw}"}
        ,"workloadName", "", "deployment", "daemonset", "statefulset")
        ,"workloadType", "$1", "__name__", "kube_(.*)_(status|spec)_.*")
  ,"workload", ":", "workloadType", "workloadName")
) by (workload) >=0 
) or vector(0),"_","Workload Readiness","","")

## Container Restart Health:
############################
label_replace(
  sgn(sum_over_time(sum(rate(
    kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}"}[10m:1m]
    )*60)[1h:]) > 5) * 0.0 # RED: Cumulative restarts over X(5) time greater than Y(1h)
  or (max(rate(
    kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}"}[5m:1m]
    )*60*5) > 0) * 0.5 # YELLOW: restarts detected but below Red threshold
  or sgn(max(
    kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}"}
    + 1 >= 0))
  #or vector(1) # Healthy
  ,"_","Container Restart Health","","")
## uncomment below to t-shoot this health metric
# or label_replace(sum_over_time(sum(rate(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{cluster=~"$cluster"}[10m:1m])*60)[1h:]),"_","Total-restarts-over-time","","")
# or label_replace((max(rate(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{cluster=~"$cluster"}[5m:1m])*60*5) without (__name__,uid,instance,job) > 0),"_","restart","","") # Base query for counting restarts

## Container CPU top-level health
################################
label_replace(
min(sgn( # Check for throttling > N indicating container is exceeding its CPU limits
      rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",container!="",pod=~"${component:raw}"}[10m]) 
    / rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",container!="",pod=~"${component:raw}"}[10m])
    >= 0.60) # If throttle create is greater than this percentage, we'll multiply sgn by 0.5 to show as error (or warning depending on threshold coloring)
    ) # by (namespace,container) # These are commented out for top-level
    * 0.0
or
min(sgn( # Check for throttling > N indicating container is exceeding its CPU limits
      rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",container!="",pod=~"${component:raw}"}[10m]) 
    / rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",container!="",pod=~"${component:raw}"}[10m])
    >= 0.40) # If throttle create is greater than this percentage, we'll multiply sgn by 0.5 to show as error (or warning depending on threshold coloring)
    ) # by (namespace,container) # These are commented out for top-level
    * 0.5
or
min( # Check to see if container is missing CPU Limits configuration
    sgn(min(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",container!="",resource="cpu",pod=~"${component:raw}"}) by (namespace,container))
    or # if resource limit missing, we or to below to show namespace/container using CPU without limit as a zero to indicate red
    sgn(min(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",container!="",pod=~"${component:raw}"}) by (namespace,container))
    # * 0 # TEMPORARILY DISABLING RED FOR MISSING LIMITS
    ) #by (namespace,container) # These are commented out for top-level
,"_","Container CPU Health","","")

## Container Memory Health:
###########################
label_replace(
min( # Look for high memory utilization
    sgn((
        max(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",container!="",pod=~"${component:raw}"}) by (namespace,container)
      / min(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",container!="",resource="memory",pod=~"${component:raw}"}) by (namespace, container)
    ) >= .95) - 0.5 # show health state of 0.5 if container memory utilization >= 95%
) #by (container) 
or
min( # Look for missing limits which we will show as 0 if missing
    sgn(min(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",container!="",resource="memory",pod=~"${component:raw}"}) by (namespace,container))
    or # if resource limit missing, we or to below to show namespace/container using CPU without limit as a zero to indicate red
    sgn(min(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",container!="",pod=~"${component:raw}"}) by (namespace,container))
    # * 0 # TEMPORARILY DISABLING RED FOR MISSING LIMITS
) #by (container) 
,"_","Container Memory health","","")

label_replace(sum ( # by(workloadType) (
#min(
#  label_join( # Workload ready percents (for deployment, daemonset, and statefulset)
    label_replace(label_join(
        kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",daemonset=~"${component:raw}"} or
        kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",deployment=~"${component:raw}"} or
        kube_statefulset_status_replicas_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",statefulset=~"${component:raw}"}
        ,"workloadName", "", "deployment", "daemonset", "replicaset", "statefulset")
        ,"workloadType", "$1", "__name__", "kube_(.*)_status_.*")
),"_","Ready","","")
#  / label_replace(label_join(
#        kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace",daemonset=~"${component:raw}"} or
#        kube_deployment_spec_replicas{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace",deployment=~"${component:raw}"} or
#        kube_statefulset_status_replicas{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace",statefulset=~"${component:raw}"}
#        ,"workloadName", "", "deployment", "daemonset", "statefulset")
#        ,"workloadType", "$1", "__name__", "kube_(.*)_(status|spec)_.*")
#  ,"workload", ":", "workloadType", "workloadName")
#) by (workload) >=0

#min(
#  label_join( # Workload ready percents (for deployment, daemonset, and statefulset)
#    label_replace(label_join(
#        kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace",deployment=~"${component:raw}"} or
#        kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace",daemonset=~"${component:raw}"} or
#        kube_statefulset_status_replicas_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace",statefulset=~"${component:raw}"}
#        ,"workloadName", "", "deployment", "daemonset", "replicaset", "statefulset")
#        ,"workloadType", "$1", "__name__", "kube_(.*)_status_.*")
#  / label_replace(label_join(
  label_replace(sum(
        kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",daemonset=~"${component:raw}"} or
        kube_deployment_spec_replicas{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",deployment=~"${component:raw}"} or
        kube_statefulset_status_replicas{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",statefulset=~"${component:raw}"}
#        ,"workloadName", "", "deployment", "daemonset", "statefulset")
#        ,"workloadType", "$1", "__name__", "kube_(.*)_(status|spec)_.*")
    ),"_","Requested","","")
#  ,"workload", ":", "workloadType", "workloadName")
#) by (workload) >=0

label_replace(
    sum(#sgn(
        kube_daemonset_status_desired_number_scheduled{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",daemonset=~"${component:raw}"} 
      - kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",daemonset=~"${component:raw}"}
      > 0)#)
  ,"status","Not-Ready","","")
or 
label_replace(
    sum(#sgn(
        kube_daemonset_status_number_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",daemonset=~"${component:raw}"}
      )#)
  ,"status","Ready","","")
or label_replace(vector(0),"status","Ready","","")
# or label_replace(vector(1),"status","Not-Ready","","") # UNCOMMENT THIS LINE TO TEST "NOT-READY" STATUS

label_replace(
    sum(#sgn(
      kube_deployment_spec_replicas{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",deployment=~"${component:raw}"} 
    - kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",deployment=~"${component:raw}"}
    > 0)#)
  ,"status","Not-Ready","","")
or 
label_replace(
    sum(#sgn(
      kube_deployment_status_replicas_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",deployment=~"${component:raw}"}
    )#)
  ,"status","Ready","","")
or label_replace(vector(0),"status","Ready","","") # this is to zero if no workloads of this type exist
# or label_replace(vector(1),"status","Not-Ready","","") # UNCOMMENT THIS LINE TO TEST "NOT-READY" STATUS

label_replace(
      sum(#sgn(
        kube_statefulset_status_replicas{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",statefulset=~"${component:raw}"} 
      - kube_statefulset_status_replicas_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",statefulset=~"${component:raw}"}
      > 0)#)
  ,"status","Not-Ready","","")
or 
label_replace(
      sum(#sgn(
        kube_statefulset_status_replicas_ready{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",statefulset=~"${component:raw}"}
      )#)
  ,"status","Ready","","")
or 
label_replace(vector(0),"status","Ready","","")
# or label_replace(vector(1),"status","Not-Ready","","") # UNCOMMENT THIS LINE TO TEST "NOT-READY" STATUS

# Container Restarts
label_replace(ceil(sum_over_time(sum(rate(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}"}[10m:1m])*60)[1h:])),"_","restarts","","")

# CPU Time (milli-cores version, if < 0.2 cores)
(label_replace(sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}[$__rate_interval]))*1000,"_","CPU Usage (milli-cores)","","") )
# Percent of containers with limits defined
or label_replace(
    count(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!="",resource="cpu"}) /
    count(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!="",cpu="total"}) *100
    ,"_","Percent containers with CPU Limits (%)","","")
# CPU Throttling:
or label_replace(100*(max(
        rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}[10m])
        / rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}[10m])
    )),"_","CPU Max Throttled (%)","","")

# Shows the max in millicores, used to determine which is shown (commented out for UX; only uncomment to debug above)
#or label_replace(quantile_over_time(0.95,sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace4workloads",pod=~".*",container!=""}[$__rate_interval]))[3d:])*1000,"_","CPU Usage (milli-cores) MAX","","")
vector(0)>0
# Sum of all limits defined, in Cores
or label_replace(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace4workloads",pod=~".*",container!="",resource="cpu"}),"_","CPU Limits (cores)","","")
# WIP:
or label_replace(
    count(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace4workloads",pod=~".*",container!="",resource="cpu"}) /
    count(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace4workloads",pod=~".*",container!="",cpu="total"}) *100
    ,"_","WIP-PERCENT_WITH_LIMITS","","")
or label_replace(count(
    kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace4workloads",pod=~".*",container!="",resource="cpu"})
    ,"_","WIP-NUMERATOR","","")
or label_replace(count(
    container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace4workloads",pod=~".*",container!="",cpu="total"}) #without(cluster,container,cpu,id,image,instance,job,name,namespace,pod)
    ,"_","WIP-DENOMINATOR","","")
#

# Memory Usage (MB version)
(label_replace(sum(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""})/(1024*1024),"_","Mem Working Bytes (MB)","","") )
# Percent containers with limits
or label_replace(
    count(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!="",resource="memory"}) /
    count(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}) *100
    ,"_","Percent containers with Memory Limits (%)","","")
# Max Mem % Usage:
or label_replace(100*(max(
    max_over_time((max by(container)(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}))[10m:])
    / max by(container)(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!="",resource="memory"})
    )),"_","Mem Max Usage vs Limit (%)","","")

# Shows the max in millicores, used to determine which is shown (commented out for UX; only uncomment to debug above)
#or label_replace(quantile_over_time(0.95,sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace4workloads",pod=~".*",container!=""}[$__rate_interval]))[3d:])*1000,"_","CPU Usage (milli-cores) MAX","","")
vector(0)>0
# Sum of all limits defined, in Cores
or label_replace(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace4workloads",pod=~".*",container!="",resource="cpu"}),"_","CPU Limits (cores)","","")
# WIP:
or label_replace(
    count(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace4workloads",pod=~".*",container!="",resource="cpu"}) /
    count(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace4workloads",pod=~".*",container!="",cpu="total"}) *100
    ,"_","WIP-PERCENT_WITH_LIMITS","","")
or label_replace(count(
    kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace4workloads",pod=~".*",container!="",resource="cpu"})
    ,"_","WIP-NUMERATOR","","")
or label_replace(count(
    container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~"$namespace4workloads",pod=~".*",container!="",cpu="total"}) #without(cluster,container,cpu,id,image,instance,job,name,namespace,pod)
    ,"_","WIP-DENOMINATOR","","")
#

# CPU Time (milli-cores version, if < 0.2 cores)
max by(_)(
    label_replace(#quantile_over_time($latency_percentile,(
        sum by(pod)(rate(
        container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}
        [$__rate_interval]))#)[$latency_quantile_range:])
        *1000,"_","$1","pod","(.*)(-[0-9]$|-[0-9]$|-[^-]+-.....$)") or
    label_replace(#quantile_over_time($latency_percentile,(
        sum (rate(
        container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}
        [$__rate_interval]))#)[$latency_quantile_range:])
        *1000,"_",".Overall","","") or
vector(0)>0)

# CPU Time (milli-cores version, if < 0.2 cores)
max by(_)(
label_replace(
    sum by(pod)(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""})/(1024*1024),"_","$1","pod","(.*)(-[0-9]$|-[0-9]$|-[^-]+-.....$)") 
)
##(label_replace(sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}[$__rate_interval]))*1000,"_","CPU Usage (milli-cores)","","") )
##    and label_replace(max_over_time(sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}[$__rate_interval]))[3d:]) < 0.2,"_","CPU Usage (milli-cores)","","")) # Show milli-cores if rate below 0.2 cores
# CPU Time (cores version, if >= 0.2 cores)
##or (label_replace(sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}[$__rate_interval])),"_","CPU Usage (cores)","","") 
##    and label_replace(max_over_time(sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}[$__rate_interval]))[3d:]) >= 0.2,"_","CPU Usage (cores)","","")) # Show in cores if rate at or above 0.2 cores
# Shows the max in millicores, used to determine which is shown (commented out for UX; only uncomment to debug above)
#or label_replace(max_over_time(sum(rate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}[$__rate_interval]))[3d:])*1000,"_","CPU Usage (milli-cores) MAX","","")
# Sum of all limits defined, in Cores
##or label_replace(sum(kube_pod_container_resource_limits{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!="",resource="cpu"}),"_","CPU Limits (cores)","","")
# CPU Throttling:
##or label_replace(100*(max(
##        rate(container_cpu_cfs_throttled_periods_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}[10m])
##        / rate(container_cpu_cfs_periods_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}[10m])
##    )),"_","CPU Max Throttled (%)","","")

panels.description: Click on data series to drill down into pod details

targets.expr:
# CPU Time (milli-cores version, if < 0.2 cores)
max by(pod)(
    label_replace(#quantile_over_time($latency_percentile,(
        sum by(pod)(rate(
        container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}
        [$__rate_interval]))#)[$latency_quantile_range:])
        *1000,"_","$1","pod","(.*)") or #,"(.*)(-[0-9]$|-[0-9]$|-[^-]+-.....$)") or
    label_replace(#quantile_over_time($latency_percentile,(
        sum (rate(
        container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}
        [$__rate_interval]))#)[$latency_quantile_range:])
        *1000,"pod",".Overall","","") or
vector(0)>0)

# CPU Time (milli-cores version, if < 0.2 cores)
max by(_)(
    label_replace(#quantile_over_time($latency_percentile,(
        sum by(pod)(rate(
        container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}
        [$__rate_interval]))#)[$latency_quantile_range:])
        *1000,"_","$1","pod","(.*)(-[0-9]$|-[0-9]$|-[^-]+-.....$)") or
    label_replace(#quantile_over_time($latency_percentile,(
        sum (rate(
        container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{cluster=~"$cluster",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""}
        [$__rate_interval]))#)[$latency_quantile_range:])
        *1000,"_",".Overall","","") or
vector(0)>0)

panels.title: CPU Usage by Pod

targets.expr:
# Memory working bytes
max by(pod)(
label_replace(
    sum by(pod)(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""})/(1024*1024),"_","$1","pod","(.*)(-[0-9]$|-[0-9]$|-[^-]+-.....$)") 
)

# Memory working bytes
max by(_)(
label_replace(
    sum by(pod)(container_memory_working_set_bytes{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}",container!=""})/(1024*1024),"_","$1","pod","(.*)(-[0-9]$|-[0-9]$|-[^-]+-.....$)") 
)

panels.title: Memory Usage by Pod

panels.description: Shows workloads which are not available
panels.title: Workloads in Not Ready State

targets.expr: sum(increase(kube_pod_container_status_restarts_total{cluster=~"$cluster",namespace=~".*",pod=~"${component:raw}"}[$__rate_interval]) > 0) by (container)

options.content: Errors & Logs

azureLogAnalytics.query:
KubeEvents
| where TimeGenerated > $__timeFrom() and TimeGenerated <= $__timeTo()
| where ClusterName == '$cluster'
| where Name matches regex '${component:raw}'
//| order by TimeGenerated desc
| order by LastSeen desc, FirstSeen desc, TimeGenerated desc
| project-rename PodName = Name
| project FirstSeen, LastSeen, Count, PodName, Reason, Message
| take 10

options.content: ${component_text} - Control Plane

targets.expr: sum(increase(aio_dp_reconcile_event{cluster="$cluster"}[$__range])) by (name, namespace) > 0
sum(increase(aio_dp_reconcile_error{cluster="$cluster"}[$__range])) by (type, name, namespace, error_code) > 0

azureLogAnalytics.query:
ContainerLogV2
| where TimeGenerated >= $__timeFrom() and TimeGenerated <= $__timeTo()
| where _ResourceId contains '$cluster'
| where ContainerName == "manager"
| where PodName contains "aio-dp-operator"
| where LogMessage contains "trace_id"
| extend log = parse_json(LogMessage)
| extend attributes = parse_json(log["attributes"])
| extend attributes=bag_remove_keys(attributes, dynamic(['name', 'code.namespace', 'code.function']))
| project log["timestamp"], log["name"], log["status_code"], log["status_message"], attributes

list.description: Defines the service Component this report focuses on.
list.name: component

list.description: Defines the service Component this report focuses on.
list.name: component_text

list.description: Pipeline RegEx for the self-test pipeline
list.name: aio_dp_self_test_pipeline
